header.description:
What's New
- cheat codes added view list of cheat codes here : https://goo.gl/LBY1zm
- Fixed Some Minor Bugs - Updated Tutorial - Re-equip the coin you already bought without having to pay for it again - New Rank System - start with a $1,000,000 in the Bank - New Bank System With Number Pad Input / No Bugs
* Coin Flash * Username Menu * These Features was requested by many users * Added a Bank System * Bank Gains Interest * added 4 New Coin Skin's * Music Player * New UI * Back Button Is Faster * Removed Lag * Improved Math For Money * Added 3D Affects * No Load Screen * Improved Code
